title: PSA: If you are tabbed in Champ select the game won't pop up during your pick
body: I used to be tabbed during Old champ select then my screen would pop up when it's my pick. If you try this now you will most likely dodge as the screen will not pop up anymore

replies.body: Solution: Don't alt+tab during champ select or at the very least switch back more frequently.

I'm aware of the solution. That is the point of this post. Do not tab alt during champ select. However I wasn't aware of this and seeing as half the games are dodges now, i'm pretty sure the community isn't aware either

And wait times can be insanely long sometimes. I've waited 5+ minutes in the past for normal solo queue. It's hard not to alt+tab to read a bit of an article on tvtropes or surf the boards after the first minute.
that sounds great except champ select can be a 25 min process now so should we shouldnt be able to tab out and do anything else during that stupid amount of time
